de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientLogin


  • public interface IClientLogin
    Methods for the login and logout at the client.
    was:
    ClientLogin.java

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOGOUT_DEFAULT
      To allow the logout.
      static int LOGOUT_PREVENT
      To prevent the logout.
      static int LOGOUT_WITHOUT_CONFIRMATION
      To allow the logout without any further confirmation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postLogin(String operator)
      Is called after an operator has been logged in
      void postLogout(String operator)
      Is called after an operator has been logged out
      boolean preLogin(String operator)
      Is called before an operator will be logged in.
      int preLogout(String operator)
      Is called before an operator is logged out

    • Method Detail

      • preLogin

        boolean preLogin(String operator)
        Is called before an operator will be logged in.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator name that is logged in
        Returns:
        true if the operator has the permission to log in, false otherwise

      • postLogin

        void postLogin(String operator)
        Is called after an operator has been logged in
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator name that is logged in

      • preLogout

        int preLogout(String operator)
        Is called before an operator is logged out
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator name that is logged in
        Returns:
        LOGOUT_DEFAULT,LOGOUT_PREVENT or LOGOUT_WITHOUT_CONFIRMATION

      • postLogout

        void postLogout(String operator)
        Is called after an operator has been logged out
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator name that is logged in
